dc_title_s: A new map of the province of Quebec according to the royal proclamation, of the 7th of October 1763
dc_description_s: 1 map ; hand col. ; 48 x 66 cm.|Includes inset maps: A Particular survey of the Isles of Montreal -- Plan of Montreal, or Villemarie -- City of Quebec -- Course of the River St. Laurence from la Valterie to Quebec.|State 1 with original title.|Insets show detailed city plans with tables of references to major features.|Manuscript note on verso: Major Andr√© depty. adjt. genl.
